title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
**Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins**

**Product Name:** Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins

**Product Overview:**
Celebrate the season of joy and giving with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. Perfectly capturing the essence of the Christmas spirit, these beautiful blue polyester napkins are adorned with gold embroidered texts that reflect the deep religious significance of the holiday. 

**Key Features:**
- **Design Theme:** Each napkin showcases an elegant Christmas Nativity scene, creating a festive atmosphere at your holiday table.
- **Material & Finish:** Crafted from high-quality polyester, these napkins boast a smooth and glossy finish, making them a luxurious addition to your Christmas decor.
- **Embroidery & Symbolism:** The set features six inspirational sayings - 'Joy', 'Love', 'Blessed', 'Merry', 'Believe', 'Peace' - each embroidered in gold, echoing the religious themes of the season.
- **Color:** A serene blue hue serves as the backdrop for the gold text, embodying the tranquility and sacredness of the Nativity story.
- **Size:** Generously sized at 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm), these napkins are perfect for all kinds of Christmas gatherings and meals.
- **Reusability:** These napkins are designed to be both washable and reusable, ensuring they can adorn your table for many seasons to come.
- **Gift Idea:** A thoughtful and suitable present for family, friends, or fellow believers, these napkins are an expressive and meaningful gift.
- **Package Contents:** The set includes 12 embroidered Christmas cloth napkins, enough to accommodate a large gathering or to have extras on hand for multiple occasions.

**Specifications:**
- Quantity: 12
- Material: Polyester
- Color: Blue
- Size: 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm)
- Embroidered Sayings: 'Joy', 'Love', 'Blessed', 'Merry', 'Believe', 'Peace'

**Notes:**
- Size Tolerance: Please note there may be slight errors due to manual measurement.
- Color Variation: The actual color of the napkins may vary slightly from what you see on your screen.
- Trademark Information: The words used are not as a trademark but are intended for expression only.

Add a touch of elegance and reverence to your holiday celebrations with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. Whether for use at your own Christmas dinner or as a gift for someone special, these napkins are sure to bring joy and peace to any festive occasion.
